references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a foundational low-rank adaptation technique for efficient fine-tuning of large language models, which is the primary method compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: Sparse low-rank adaptation of pre-trained language models
references.reason: This paper proposes SORA, another low-rank adaptation method focusing on sparsity, which is directly compared with the proposed method in the experiments and analysis.

references.paper_title: Concept sliders: Lora adaptors for precise control in diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces concept sliders, a technique for fine-grained image editing using LoRA, which is extended upon in this paper for merging multiple concepts.

references.paper_title: The approximation of one matrix by another of lower rank
references.reason: This foundational paper provides the theoretical basis for low-rank approximation, which is central to the core method of this paper.

references.paper_title: Simple, algorithms for fast adaptive filtering
references.reason: This early paper discusses the fundamentals of adaptive filtering, a concept that directly relates to the low-rank adaptation methods explored in this work.
